discrimintools documentation#

Date: Dec 12, 2025 Version: 0.1.0

Useful links: Binary Installers | Source Repository | Issues & Ideas |

Others packages: scientisttools | scientistmetrics | scientistshiny | scientisttseries | ggcorrplot |

discrimintools is an open source Python library dedicated to Discriminant Analysis (DA) distributed under the MIT Licence.
